column4: Provide access prior years' project cost.
Establish reimbursable budgets for projects. Reimbursable budgets control expenditures available for project billing only.
Report actual project-to-date for the capital or operating budget.
Accumulate and bill for all reimbursable portions of projects.
Provide users with security authorization to override the expendable budget.
Allow the establishment of projects that may cross funds or budget units.
